ValidationRule.description: Bank Account Number should have at least 15 digits for Hong Kong and New Markets. Between 5 and 17 digits for Malaysia. Between 8 and 14 digits for Taiwan. And between 8 and 15 digits for Singapore.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Account__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'FP_Account', NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation), NOT(ISBLANK(Bank_Account_Number__c)), OR( (ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Record_Country__c , 'Hong Kong') && NOT(REGEX(Bank_Account_Number__c, "^.{15,}$"))), (ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Record_Country__c , 'Malaysia') && NOT(REGEX(Bank_Account_Number__c, "^[0-9]{5,17}$"))), (ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Record_Country__c , 'Taiwan') && NOT(REGEX(Bank_Account_Number__c, "^[0-9]{8,14}$"))), (ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Record_Country__c , 'Singapore') && NOT(REGEX(Bank_Account_Number__c, "^[0-9]{8,15}$"))), (ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Record_Country__c , 'Thailand') && NOT(REGEX(Bank_Account_Number__c, "^[0-9]{10,13}$"))), (ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Record_Country__c , 'Philippines') && NOT(REGEX(Bank_Account_Number__c, "^[0-9]{10,16}$"))), (ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Record_Country__c , 'Bangladesh') && NOT(REGEX(Bank_Account_Number__c, "^[0-9]{5,17}$"))) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The bank account needs to be in the right format
